effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Speed effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Speed effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　素早さが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　素早さが
高く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s
Speed stat to grow more after battling.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Riduce la Velocità nella lotta ma permette ai punti
base della Velocità di crescere più rapidamente.

Tabla de piedra que potencia los movimientos de
tipo Fantasma. Debe llevarla un Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Erhöht bei Levelaufstieg
den Initiative-Wert, senkt aber die Initiative
allgemein.

Objet à tenir. Permet à la Vitesse de progresser
plus vite, mais la réduit pendant le combat.

지니게 하면 스피드는 떨어지지만
여느 때보다 포켓몬의 스피드를
올리면서 키우기가 쉽다.

もたせると　すばやさが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　すばやさが
たかく　そだちやすい。

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Speed gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Speed gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.

Objet à tenir. Il augmente la Vitesse
lors des montées de niveau mais réduit
la Vitesse pendant le combat.

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Speed gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.
